EN.generateQuestionsPrompt: Describe your concerns or input, and we will help generate questions:
EN.generatedQuestions:
Here are the questions we generated:
{questions}
EN.editPrompt: Edit the questions, separated by new lines:

EN.allSuggestionsDuplicates: All suggestions were duplicates. Please provide more details.

NO.generateQuestionsPrompt: Beskriv dine bekymringer eller innspill, så hjelper vi deg med å generere spørsmål:

NO.allSuggestionsDuplicates: Alle forslagene var duplikater. Vennligst gi mer informasjon.
